title: Foreclosure & Delinquency Count
name: ForDqTot
description: Estimated number of mortgages to start foreclosure process or be seriously delinquent during the 2008 Recession
source_long: U.S. Department of Housing and Urban Development Neighborhood Stabilization Program
comments: For more recent county, state, and metro area data on mortgage delinquencies, see Mortgage Performance Trends data from the U.S. Consumer Financial Protection Bureau.
